tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  session_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  heart_rate INTEGER,
  speed FLOAT,
  distance_covered DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE training_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    heart_rate INT,
    speed FLOAT,
    distance_covered FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_sessions (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE,
  duration INTERVAL,
  avg_heart_rate INT,
  avg_speed FLOAT,
  distance_covered FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE athletes (
  athlete_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  weight FLOAT,
  height FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE heart_rate_data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id UUID REFERENCES training_sessions(session_id),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  heart_rate INT
)

CREATE TABLE speed_data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id UUID REFERENCES training_sessions(session_id),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  speed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE distance_data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id UUID REFERENCES training_sessions(session_id),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  distance FLOAT
)
